thread.title: Curved Squares

title: Curved Squares
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
These windows are from the Citigroup Center Building palced at Paulista Avenue 1111. Citigroup Center Building belongs to the US financial group Citibank. Is was inaugurated in 1986 with project made by the architect Gian Carlo Gasperini (1926-). It have 20 floors and 93 meters (305 feet) high. Its facade is in pink granite stone and blue glass. It characterizes postmodernism 80s. The building opening was celebrated in Ibirapuera PArk with Philharmonic Orchestra of Boston presentation under the baton of India maestro Zubin Mehta. 
Matyas has marked this note useful
